# fileType

**Type Property**

The document type for interpreting the document.

## Declaration

```swift
static let fileType: NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey
```

## Discussion

The value of this attribute is an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSString] object indicating which document type was used to interpret the document, specified as a UTI; for reading, this is available along with [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSAttributedString/DocumentAttributeKey/documentType], but for writing the two are mutually exclusive.

## Getting document type keys

- **documentType**: The document type.
- **textEncodingName**: The name of the text encoding to use.

items.description: The name of the text encoding to use.
items.name: textEncodingName
